name: GameBoy Crayon Club
description:
GameBoy Crayon Club is a simple colouring book made for GBJAM8. Sit back and colour in 12 cute pictures and listen to some chill music!

A collaborative project between me (@nitrixr), Dot (@todzuaru), Elaine (@dvmbdnbslvt), Harry (@harrikko), qrqrqr0515 and Vistram (@vistram_)

Game Controls

D-Pad           
WASD or Arrow Keys

A
Z or P

B
X or O

START
Enter

SELECT
Backspace

XInput/DInput controllers (like an Xbox 360/One controller) should also work!

Menus:

D-Pad
Navigate

A
Select

B
Cancel

Sketch Mode:

D-Pad
Move Cursor

A
Use Tool A

B
Use Tool B

START
Change Color

SELECT
Change Tools

Change tools by Selecting A/B on the tool you wish to pick, then pressing SELECT again to return to the canvas

Pressing START on the Tool Menu will open up a menu that allows you to save a sketch, load a sketch, change palettes or return to the main menu

Non-Game controls

F1
Fullscreen

F2
Take Screenshot

F3
Take GB Res Screenshot

Screenshots save in My Documents/gbcrayonclub/screenshots
Your save data is saved in My Documents/gbcrayonclub/savedart
